description:
Natron Energy's sodium-ion batteries are non-flammable and have more energy density than lithium-ion batteries. Right now, they're primarily being used as emergency backup in data centers, but expect to see them powering EVs soon.

The post Natron To Spend $1.4 Billion on a Factory to Build Sodium-ion Batteries for Data Centers appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Natron To Spend $1.4 Billion on a Factory to Build Sodium-ion Batteries for Data Centers
